math3d

Interface Polygon

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConvexPolygon, Triangle

    public interface Polygon
    A polygon with 3 or more vertices.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Polygon.PolygonType
      Specifies the number of sides of the polygon.
      static class  Polygon.Vertex
      A polygon vertex with a normal vector.
      static class  Polygon.VertexOrder
      Specifies the order of the vertices in the polygon, assuming you are looking towards the front of the polygon.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Direction3 getNormal()
      Get the normal vector of this polygon.
      java.util.Collection<Polygon> getTriangles()
      Divide this polygon into triangles.
      Polygon.PolygonType getType()
      Get the polygon type.
      short getVertexCount()
      Get the number of vertices in this polygon.
      Polygon.VertexOrder getVertexOrder()
      Get the order of the vertices in this polygon when they are returned by getVertices();
      java.util.List<Polygon.Vertex> getVertices()
      Get the vertices of this polygon.

    • Method Detail

      • getType

        Polygon.PolygonType getType()
        Get the polygon type.
        Returns:
        this polygon's PolygonType

      • getVertexOrder

        Polygon.VertexOrder getVertexOrder()
        Get the order of the vertices in this polygon when they are returned by getVertices();
        Returns:
        the VertexOrder of this polygon

      • getVertices

        java.util.List<Polygon.Vertex> getVertices()
        Get the vertices of this polygon.
        Returns:
        a list of vertices, in the order specified by this polygon's VertexOrder.

      • getVertexCount

        short getVertexCount()
        Get the number of vertices in this polygon.
        Returns:
        the number of vertices

      • getNormal

        Direction3 getNormal()
        Get the normal vector of this polygon.
        Returns:
        the direction of the normal

      • getTriangles

        java.util.Collection<Polygon> getTriangles()
        Divide this polygon into triangles.
        Returns:
        a collection of TRI polygons that make up this one, in no particular order
